body:
### Steps to reproduce

```console
spack install ioapi
```

### Error message

          ixed_src)
  >> 9    make: *** No rule to make target '/tmp/vmware/spack-stage/spack-stage-ioapi-3.2-hdcvezwvxjjyo42ue5zfsmzhi2tfo
          46h/spack-src/ioapi/Makefile', needed by 'configure'.  Stop.

spack.util.executable.ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2558-ecb7d6dca1
* **Python:** 3.8.10
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake_avx512

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: Installation issue:  ioapi
